Package com.company.View

Class ConsoleView

java.lang.Object
com.company.View.ConsoleView
public class ConsoleView extends Object
class ConsoleView uses the RegistrationSystem controller provides a menu with student and teacher side, with specific actions provides Input validation methods, stores currently logged In student or teacher

    Description

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    logInStudent()
    Log In by Id for the Student, the entered id is validated if it exists in the Repo
    boolean
    logInTeacher()
    Log In by Id for the Teacher, the entered id is validated if it exists in the Repo
    void
    menu()
    The (Start) Main Menu gets user input choosing the user type (student or teacher), calls the proper Menu for the chosen option, program ends when pressing 0
    void
    option1()
    gets input from the user the Student id and the Course id, validates the input, enrolls the student to the course
    void
    option10()
    shows the list of courses filtered by having more than 10 credits
    void
    option2()
    gets input from the user the course id, validates the input, shows the students enrolled to that course
    void
    option3()
    shows the list of students sorted ascending by last name and first name
    void
    option4()
    shows the list of students filtered by having maximum total credits number
    void
    option5()
    shows the courses with free places and how many
    void
    option6()
    Adds a new course to the Course Repo, the teacher can choose if the course's teacher is new too, and adds the teacher or updates his courses list
    void
    option7()
    teacher can modify the credits number for one of his courses, teacher gives the course id and the new credits number, input is validated
    void
    option8()
    Delete a course from the logged in Teacher, teacher enters the course id, Input is validated, and the course is deleted from the teacher, from the course repo and from the students
    void
    option9()
    shows the list of courses sorted ascending by credits number
    void
    printStartMenu()
    shows the options of the Main Menu
    void
    printStudentMenu()
    Show Menu for the logged In Student, showing details about his credits and enrolled courses, showing possible actions
    void
    printTeacherMenu()
    Show Menu for the logged In Teacher, showing details about his teaching courses, showing possible actions
    void
    studentMenu()
    Student Menu with actions: enrolling to a course, showing available courses, sorting courses by credits number, filtering courses by having more than 10 credits, pressing 0 for Exit
    void
    teacherMenu()
    Teacher Menu with actions: enrolling a student to a course, showing students enrolled to a course, sorting students by name, filtering student by having maximum total credits number, showing available courses, adding a new course, updating credits to a course, deleting a course, sorting courses by credits number, filtering courses by having more than 10 credits, pressing 0 for Exit
    Course
    validateCourseInput()
    finds the Course with the given id if the input id does not belong to any Course in the Repo, the input repeats
    Long
    validateNumberInput(String message)
    validates that the input is a Long number asks for a new input as long as the given input is not a Long number
    Student
    validateStudentInput()
    finds the Student with the given id if the input id does not belong to any Student in the Repo, the input repeats

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • validateNumberInput

      public Long validateNumberInput(String message)
      validates that the input is a Long number asks for a new input as long as the given input is not a Long number
      Parameters:
      message - shows the message when asking for Input
      Returns:
      the Long number given by the user

    • validateStudentInput

      public Student validateStudentInput()
      finds the Student with the given id if the input id does not belong to any Student in the Repo, the input repeats
      Returns:
      the Student that has id the input number

    • validateCourseInput

      public Course validateCourseInput()
      finds the Course with the given id if the input id does not belong to any Course in the Repo, the input repeats
      Returns:
      the Course that has id the input number

    • option1

      public void option1()
      gets input from the user the Student id and the Course id, validates the input, enrolls the student to the course

    • option2

      public void option2()
      gets input from the user the course id, validates the input, shows the students enrolled to that course

    • option3

      public void option3()
      shows the list of students sorted ascending by last name and first name

    • option4

      public void option4()
      shows the list of students filtered by having maximum total credits number

    • option5

      public void option5()
      shows the courses with free places and how many

    • option6

      public void option6()
      Adds a new course to the Course Repo, the teacher can choose if the course's teacher is new too, and adds the teacher or updates his courses list

    • option7

      public void option7()
      teacher can modify the credits number for one of his courses, teacher gives the course id and the new credits number, input is validated

    • option8

      public void option8()
      Delete a course from the logged in Teacher, teacher enters the course id, Input is validated, and the course is deleted from the teacher, from the course repo and from the students

    • option9

      public void option9()
      shows the list of courses sorted ascending by credits number

    • option10

      public void option10()
      shows the list of courses filtered by having more than 10 credits

    • printStartMenu

      public void printStartMenu()
      shows the options of the Main Menu

    • logInStudent

      public boolean logInStudent()
      Log In by Id for the Student, the entered id is validated if it exists in the Repo
      Returns:
      true if the studentId exists in the Repo, else false

    • logInTeacher

      public boolean logInTeacher()
      Log In by Id for the Teacher, the entered id is validated if it exists in the Repo
      Returns:
      true if the teacherId exists in the Repo, else false

    • printStudentMenu

      public void printStudentMenu()
      Show Menu for the logged In Student, showing details about his credits and enrolled courses, showing possible actions

    • printTeacherMenu

      public void printTeacherMenu()
      Show Menu for the logged In Teacher, showing details about his teaching courses, showing possible actions

    • teacherMenu

      public void teacherMenu()
      Teacher Menu with actions: enrolling a student to a course, showing students enrolled to a course, sorting students by name, filtering student by having maximum total credits number, showing available courses, adding a new course, updating credits to a course, deleting a course, sorting courses by credits number, filtering courses by having more than 10 credits, pressing 0 for Exit

    • studentMenu

      public void studentMenu()
      Student Menu with actions: enrolling to a course, showing available courses, sorting courses by credits number, filtering courses by having more than 10 credits, pressing 0 for Exit

    • menu

      public void menu()
      The (Start) Main Menu gets user input choosing the user type (student or teacher), calls the proper Menu for the chosen option, program ends when pressing 0
